settings.title: Vape and Juice | The Local Ecig shop online
settings.html:
Vape and Juice began in 2014 in Southend, Essex as one of the early vape shop brands. We believe in traditional customer service values, which we have brought online. From free shipping vape mail regardless of order size, to webchat managed by vapers and not bots. We stock the best vapes online, cbd e-liquid, hemp oil, vaping box mods and a range of starter vape kits. Whatever your e-cigarette experience level, we can meet your needs.

Vape special offers, premium e liquid for vaping pens, dry herb vape kits and DNA mods are stocked on our online CBD and vapour store, as well as offline in our e-cig shops London, Kent, Essex, Yeovil and Ibiza. In 2018 we began same-day vape delivery with Vaperun. Buy CBD eliquid and ecig ejuice now.

settings.title: Shipping
settings.code:
UK Shipping

  • We offer a free UK Standard Royal Mail Shipping Service that is carried under 2nd Class.
    This is advised as 2-5 working days after day of order.

  • Royal Mail 1st Class - 1-2 working days

  • Royal Mail Signed for - 1-2 working days requires signature at residence.

  • Express Next Day - If order placed before 4pm Mon - Fri, will be received by customer next working day


    • Want SAMEDAY Vape Delivery? Check out our sister site: Vaperun.com


    International


    • Standard Shipping EU - 7-10 Working days

    • Express International EU - 5-7 Working days

    • Signed for International (All World) - 5-7 Working days

    Please note that only orders that are placed before 4pm will be processed for next day delivery if it is chosen upon checkout. Orders placed after 4pm will be processed the following morning.

    Vape Juices and Kits shipped to Australia, Germany, USA, New Zealand, Tunisia, Hungary, Spain, Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Finland, South Africa and many many more countries besides.

settings.footer_text: This shop will be powered by Shopify

settings.question: What are the payment methods available?
settings.answer: At the moment, we only accept Credit/Debit cards and Paypal payments.

settings.question: How do you ship my orders?
settings.answer: All your orders are sent via Singapore Post Limited (SingPost).

settings.question: How many free samples can I redeem?
settings.answer: Due to the limited quantity, each member's account is only entitled to 1 unique free sample. You can check out up to 4 free samples in each checkout.

settings.question: How can I change my shipping address?
settings.answer: By default, the last used shipping address will be saved into to your Sample Store account. When you are checking out your order, the default shipping address will be displayed and you have the option to amend it if you need to.

settings.question: How do I make payments using Paypal? How does it work?
settings.answer:
Paypal is the easiest way to make payments online. While checking out your order, you will be redirected to the Paypal website. Be sure to fill in correct details for fast & hassle-free payment processing. After a successful Paypal payment, a payment advice will be automatically generated to Samplestore.com system for your order.

It's fast, easy & secure.

settings.question: How can I track my orders & payment?
settings.answer: After logging into your account, the status of your checkout history can be found under Order History. For orders via registered postage, a tracking number (article tracking number) will be given to you after the receipt given from Singapore Post Limited (SingPost).

settings.question: How long will it take for my order to arrive after I make payment?
settings.answer:
Members who ship their orders within Singapore should expect to receive their orders within five (5) to ten (10) working days upon payment verification depending on the volume of orders received.

If you experience delays in receiving your order, contact us immediately and we will help to confirm the status of your order.

settings.question: How can I use my remaining Account Credits?
settings.answer: We are in the process of removing the option to pay for your orders by âAccount Creditsâ. If you have remaining credits in your account, it will be used to pay for your next checkout. If there are insufficient credits, the system will direct you automatically to pay the balance via Paypal.

settings.question: How do I cancel my orders before I make a payment?
settings.answer: After logging into your account, go to your Shopping Cart. Here, you will be able to make payment or cancel your order. Note: We cannot give refunds once payment is verified.

settings.heading: Buy Non Juul pods compatible with Juul Kits for CBD Online
settings.content: Buy Juul compatible pods from the OVNS range, which makes CBD juuling possible too with this unofficial/totally not endorsed hack. Open to something better than a Juul Kit? We stock the best pod vape kits. These Non Juul Pods are not endorsed by Juul and partner companies. When we criticise Juul, we do it in our own opinion as we have no affiliation to them.
